scripts.dev: concurrently -n API,WEB "npm run dev --prefix packages/api" "npm run dev --prefix packages/web"
scripts.build: npm run build --prefix packages/shared && npm run build --prefix packages/api && npm run build --prefix packages/web
scripts.test: npm run test --prefix packages/api && npm run test --prefix packages/web
scripts.lint: npm run lint --prefix packages/api && npm run lint --prefix packages/web
scripts.clean: npm run clean --prefix packages/api && npm run clean --prefix packages/web && rm -rf node_modules
scripts.install:all: npm install && npm install --prefix packages/shared && npm install --prefix packages/api && npm install --prefix packages/web && npm install --prefix packages/worker
